mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_api_log (url, method, query, body, timestamp) VALUES (#{url}, #{method}, #{query}, #{body}, #{timestamp})
INSERT INTO tb_api_log (url, method, query, body, obj_uuid, obj_code, user_id, timestamp) VALUES (#{url}, #{method}, #{query}, #{body}, #{objUuid}, #{objCode}, #{userId}, #{timestamp})
